title: Zoopla Property Scraper
description: Fast, stealthy Zoopla scraper using JSON-LD extraction. Extracts property listings with prices, addresses, and details from Zoopla UK.

startUrl.title: Search URL
startUrl.description: Zoopla search URL to scrape. Example: https://www.zoopla.co.uk/for-sale/property/london/

startUrls.title: Multiple search URLs
startUrls.description: Optional list of multiple Zoopla search URLs to crawl.

results_wanted.title: Maximum listings
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of property listings to collect (1-1000).

max_pages.title: Maximum pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search pages to process per URL.

collectDetails.title: Collect full property details
collectDetails.description: Visit each property detail page to extract descriptions, images, and structured data. Slower but more complete.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Recommended: Use Apify residential proxies with UK country code for best results.
